attributes.action: To free Zimbabwe from Robert Mugabe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The United Nations, European Union, Amnesty International and countless human rights group's have highlighted the suffering in Zimbabwe. This dictator has raped his own countryand persecuted his ownpeople. It's time for the British to dothe right thing andremove him from power. Historian's say the greatest gift we gave to the world was a modern democracy andit's our duty (asthe mother of all parliaments) to defend theliberty andfreedom of the citizens of Zimbabwe. Please helpthem Prime Minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
